blog.name: sleeping-in-quicksand
blog.title: Made of Stories
blog.description: but talking is another country. ida [ee-da]. canon bisexual. non-binary; she/he/they. introverted ostrich. a rough draft. occasional writer. [ao3: id8a]

summary: at this point i can’t see lucas and mika being as close as isak and eskild, or martino and filippo, but that’s okay? i...
body: at this point i can’t see lucas and mika being as close as isak and eskild, or martino and filippo, but that’s okay? i definitely think apologies and acknowledgments are necessary on lucas’ part, and i hope they do reach a more understanding ground, a place with more acceptance, compassion, and empathy, but i don’t need them to be very close? sometimes it’s just a personality thing. like, not all gay people have to automatically get along. & with alexia being a proud and open bisexual it would be very cool of skamfr if they would to develop and grow her friendship with lucas & highlight a different kind of queer friendship.

reblog.comment: at this point i can’t see lucas and mika being as close as isak and eskild, or martino and filippo, but that’s okay? i definitely think apologies and acknowledgments are necessary on lucas’ part, and i hope they do reach a more understanding ground, a place with more acceptance, compassion, and empathy, but i don’t need them to be very close? sometimes it’s just a personality thing. like, not all gay people have to automatically get along. & with alexia being a proud and open bisexual it would be very cool of skamfr if they would to develop and grow her friendship with lucas & highlight a different kind of queer friendship.

trail.content_raw: at this point i can’t see lucas and mika being as close as isak and eskild, or martino and filippo, but that’s okay? i definitely think apologies and acknowledgments are necessary on lucas’ part, and i hope they do reach a more understanding ground, a place with more acceptance, compassion, and empathy, but i don’t need them to be very close? sometimes it’s just a personality thing. like, not all gay people have to automatically get along. & with alexia being a proud and open bisexual it would be very cool of skamfr if they would to develop and grow her friendship with lucas & highlight a different kind of queer friendship.
trail.content: at this point i can’t see lucas and mika being as close as isak and eskild, or martino and filippo, but that’s okay? i definitely think apologies and acknowledgments are necessary on lucas’ part, and i hope they do reach a more understanding ground, a place with more acceptance, compassion, and empathy, but i don’t need them to be very close? sometimes it’s just a personality thing. like, not all gay people have to automatically get along. & with alexia being a proud and open bisexual it would be very cool of skamfr if they would to develop and grow her friendship with lucas & highlight a different kind of queer friendship.

summary: Isn't Basile supposed to be French's Magnus? I just don't see it you know. Sure Magnus was desperated but not to the point of...
body:
Isn’t Basile supposed to be French’s Magnus? I just don’t see it you know. Sure Magnus was desperated but not to the point of disrespecting women like Basile. And I just don’t see he would be the understanding one about mental illness.

Skam France was one hella good of a ride so far but after the turn out with Mika today I hope they change the plot line, maybe Daphne can be the one who talks about it? Slim chance but still.

Lucas can just fucking deck ME instead.

It would hurt less than watching tomorrows clip.

blog.name: youreonlylow
blog.title: NotMundane
blog.description: MultiFandomBlog, mostly skam and it's remakes and what ever shows I am binging atm. Some discourse, some political stuff. But also just whatever I want to reblog, from all the weird stuff on my dash!

question: established!relationship or domestic elu pls<3
answer:
Here ya go! I don’t really know why this came about and I haven’t read it through and it’s late but I hope you enjoy it! I have a lot of requests to get to so look out for more!


It’s been eight months. Eight amazing but tough months. And now they are here. At a small party, with the girls, the guys, some other friends they made in the common room. And it’s nice. It hasn’t been easy at all, but they are still here. Still standing. It was hard to believe that this was his life now. Surrounded by people and still being able to just be himself. He was sitting on the floor in between Eliott’s legs chatting with his friends. Eliott was leaning on one arm with a beer bottle in the other. Lucas was leaning on his chest, loving the sturdiness he felt. His friends were laughing, talking, having a good time. And Lucas was getting tipsy. Okay, maybe a bit more than tipsy. He leaned his head back to look up at Eliott.

“I love you,” he said loud enough that Eliott would hear but no one else. Eliott looked down at him, leaning his head over Lucas a little.

“I love you, too, and you’re drunk,” Eliott said and laughed a little, that Eliott smile spreading on his face.

Lucas brought a hand up to the back of Eliott’s head and brought him down for a kiss. It was supposed to be quick as the position was a bit weird, but Lucas found himself not wanting to stop. As they continued and the kiss deepened, shouts of encouragement and friendly catcalls came from the people around them. They both smiled and Lucas flipped off the room and people around them. He was too happy to care about the excessive PDA they were displaying. He broke the kiss and snuggled closer to Eliott but Eliott wasn’t ready so his arm slipped from under him and they fell down on the floor. Laughter erupted both from them and their friends.

“Next time you push your entire body weight against me maybe warn a guy?” Eliott asked while laughing and sitting back up.

They got up and sat on the sofa as to not have a repeat of their little accident. Eliott looked a little too good in his black t-shirt and ruffled hair. So, when the attention and disappeared from them he started kissing Eliott again. With better access, better kissing, and so hand started wandering. The alcohol was really getting to Lucas along with the hormones and chemicals flooding his body from kissing Eliott.

“Is it too rude to kick them all out so we don’t have to leave the couch to have sex?” Lucas whispered in Eliott’s ear. Eliott leaned back and looked at Lucas, raising his eyebrows, seriously. Lucas laughed a little, “Maybe we can just discreetly disappear into your room…”

“Lucas, you know they’ll notice. But I promise. As soon as they leave. If you’re not too drunk at that time to get it up.” Eliott laughed.

“Hey! That happened once! And it’s not like your medicine when you up them don’t affect you either,” he smiled down at his boyfriend.

“Good thing we found a solution to that isn’t it?” Eliott said with a grin suggestively. Lucas grinned back at him and kissed him.

They got up to join their friends on the make-shift dance floor. Life was good. At least at this moment. This minute.
